body.directions: You have your chance to identify the verb forms!

body.quiz:
Fill in the blank: Translate the Latin verb into English.


Sentence Verb to Use: doceo, docere, docui, doctus, -a, -um = to teach

Latin: docentur


Fill in the blank English answer: *_
body.correct: That's right! Gratulationes on putting your best foot forward!
body.incorrect: Take another look at the Latin and give it another shot. Bona fortuna!
body.failed: The answer has been filled in for you, but you're sure to get it next time.
body.failedHeading: Not quite, but you'll get it soon!
